attributes.action: improve communication between soliders and their friends and family back home when they are on tour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Surely soliders will be more willing to work if they knew they could speak to their family when there done.

Communication between soliders in Iraq and Afganistan and thier famly is appauling and to boost moral we should aim to improve this.
